channel.title: NPR Topics: National
channel.description: NPR coverage of national news, U.S. politics, elections, business, arts, culture, health and science, and technology. Subscribe to the NPR Nation RSS feed.

item.title: AI images and internet rumors spread confusion about ICE agent involved in shooting
item.description: While the agent wore a mask in videos taken of the event, he appeared to be unmasked in many social media posts. That image appeared to have been generated by xAI's generative AI chatbot, Grok.
item.content:encoded:
While the agent wore a mask in videos taken of the event, he appeared to be unmasked in many social media posts. That image appeared to have been generated by xAI's generative AI chatbot, Grok.

(Image credit: Screenshots by NPR/Image by Courtney Theophin)
item.dc:creator: Geoff Brumfiel

item.title: Photos: Protests grow over the fatal ICE shooting in Minneapolis
item.description: In cities across the country, demonstrators have expressed grief and outrage over the death of Renee Nicole Good, who was fatally shot by an Immigration and Customs Enforcement officer on Wednesday morning.
item.content:encoded:
In cities across the country, demonstrators have expressed grief and outrage over the death of Renee Nicole Good, who was fatally shot by an Immigration and Customs Enforcement officer on Wednesday morning.

(Image credit: Kerem Yucel/MPR)
item.dc:creator: Juliana Kim

item.title: Renee Nicole Good isn't the first death caused by ICE under Trump administration
item.description: The deadly incident in Minnesota isn't the first time ICE officers have been involved in violence under the Trump administration.
item.content:encoded: The deadly incident in Minnesota isn't the first time ICE officers have been involved in violence under the Trump administration.
item.dc:creator: Sergio Martínez-Beltrán

item.title: Noem insists that ICE agent who fatally shot woman in Minneapolis did nothing wrong
item.description: Protests continue in Minneapolis over the death of a woman shot by an ICE agent. The head of Minnesota's investigative agency says federal officials have blocked it from conducting an investigation.
item.content:encoded: Protests continue in Minneapolis over the death of a woman shot by an ICE agent. The head of Minnesota's investigative agency says federal officials have blocked it from conducting an investigation.
item.dc:creator: Matt Sepic

item.title: Who was Renee Nicole Good?
item.description: We're continuing to learn more about the 37-year-old woman who was shot and killed by an Immigration and Customs Enforcement officer in Minneapolis on Wednesday.
item.content:encoded: We're continuing to learn more about the 37-year-old woman who was shot and killed by an Immigration and Customs Enforcement officer in Minneapolis on Wednesday.
item.dc:creator: Karen Zamora

item.title: How Joe Biden made big gains battling street fentanyl but lost the messaging war to Donald Trump
item.description: A growing body of data shows Joe Biden and Kamala Harris made unprecedented gains reducing fentanyl deaths, while dramatically slowing supply of the deadly opioid into the U-S. But critics say Democrats allowed Trump to out-message them on fentanyl, with sweeping consequences for U-S drug policy, public safety, and health.
item.content:encoded: A growing body of data shows Joe Biden and Kamala Harris made unprecedented gains reducing fentanyl deaths, while dramatically slowing supply of the deadly opioid into the U-S. But critics say Democrats allowed Trump to out-message them on fentanyl, with sweeping consequences for U-S drug policy, public safety, and health.
item.dc:creator: Brian Mann

item.title: A 'medical situation' is forcing NASA to end mission at the space station a month early
item.description: NASA says a crew member on the International Space Station is unwell. The agency canceled a planned spacewalk for Thursday and is taking the rare step of ending the Crew-11 mission early.
item.content:encoded:
NASA says a crew member on the International Space Station is unwell. The agency canceled a planned spacewalk for Thursday and is taking the rare step of ending the Crew-11 mission early.

(Image credit: Gregg Newton)
item.dc:creator: Brendan Byrne

item.title: What we know one day after the killing of Renee Good by an ICE agent in Minneapolis
item.description: As Minneapolis continued to grapple with a deep divide over how the fatal shooting was being portrayed, police said two people in Portland, Ore., were shot and injured by U.S. Border Patrol agents.
item.content:encoded:
As Minneapolis continued to grapple with a deep divide over how the fatal shooting was being portrayed, police said two people in Portland, Ore., were shot and injured by U.S. Border Patrol agents.

(Image credit: Charly Triballeau)
item.dc:creator: Bill Chappell

item.title: Minnesota and federal officials are no longer cooperating on ICE shooting investigation
item.description: In two press conferences about an hour apart, Minnesota's governor and the White House disagreed about the facts behind Wednesday's fatal ICE shooting in Minneapolis.
item.content:encoded:
In two press conferences about an hour apart, Minnesota's governor and the White House disagreed about the facts behind Wednesday's fatal ICE shooting in Minneapolis.

(Image credit: Mike Householder)
item.dc:creator: Alana Wise

item.title: Minnesota State Sen. Zaynab Mohamed reacts to fatal ICE shooting of Minneapolis woman
item.description: NPR's Steve Inskeep speaks with Minnesota State Sen. Zaynab Mohamed, who represents the Minneapolis district where a woman was fatally shot by an ICE agent Wednesday.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Steve Inskeep speaks with Minnesota State Sen. Zaynab Mohamed, who represents the Minneapolis district where a woman was fatally shot by an ICE agent Wednesday.
item.dc:creator: Steve Inskeep
